When this creature enters, for each snow mana used to cast it choose up to one:
• Tap target nonland permanent.
• Put a stun counter on target nonland permanent.

When this creature enters, target nonland permanent. If it is tapped, put a stun counter on it. Otherwise, tap it. For each snow mana used to cast this creature you may copy this ability. You may choose new targets for the copy.
